titleStmt.title: A sad and true relation of a person found dead in Gun-Fields, on the back-side of Ratcliff-Highway on Sunday morning, the 12th. of this instant September, 1686. Wherein he was found lying against a banck side in a ditch, to the great terror and amazement of all that beheld it, &c.

A sad and true relation of a person found dead in Gun-Fields, on the back-side of Ratcliff-Highway on Sunday morning, the 12th. of this instant September, 1686. Wherein he was found lying against a banck side in a ditch, to the great terror and amazement of all that beheld it, &c.

notesStmt.note: "This may be printed, R.P. September the 18th, 1686"--P. [2].
Reproduction of original in the Bodleian Library.
